results.title: Review Dependabot npm PRs for docs/package.json bundle
results.author: Copilot
results.body: Reviewed and approved Dependabot dependency updates for `/docs/package.json`
results.action_explanation: PR is in draft status and was just created. Quality score is fair (10/20). While the documentation is comprehensive, this is low-priority infrastructure work that can wait for the author to mark it ready for review.
results.impact_rationale: Documentation and automation for Dependabot review process. Helpful but not critical.
results.urgency_rationale: Very recent PR (3.5 hours old). Still in draft. No immediate urgency.
results.quality_rationale: Good description with detailed analysis. CI status pending. Draft status.
